title: Yukihiro Aoba
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
Aoba was born in <a href="Higashimatsuyama%2C%20Saitama">Higashimatsuyama</a> on July 26, 1979. After graduating from <a href="Juntendo%20University">Juntendo University</a>, he joined <a href="J2%20League">J2 League</a> club <a href="Ventforet%20Kofu">Ventforet Kofu</a> in 2002. He became a regular player as left side back from first season. Although his original position is side back, he also played many matches as center back. Ventforet won the 3rd place in <a href="2005%20J.League%20Division%202">2005 season</a> and was promoted to <a href="J1%20League">J1 League</a>. However he left the club end of 2005 season without playing J1. In 2006, he moved to J2 club <a href="Tokyo%20Verdy">Tokyo Verdy</a>. However he could not play many matches. In 2007, he moved to <a href="Tokushima%20Vortis">Tokushima Vortis</a>. He played many matches as regular player. He retired end of 2007 season.
